title: Finally!!!
comment: Google search is terrible at searching local content and oddly enough the app drawer has no search feature.  This gives you fast and accurate launchy style app searches one swipe away.  Solves an embarrassing android shortcoming.  However, the widget is hideous :)

title: crap
comment: screens good but it is a piece of unfunctional crap intended only to still some data like apps history

title: essential android app
comment: ... i use it on all android devices - now and in the past. it's essential.
I like it because is very fast,  but I usually search for files,  folders.

title: One of the best time savers
comment: We often times take for granted we will find the application we are looking for but the reality is that we will just waste time swiping back and forth. This application has saved me thousands of seconds that I would have otherwise wasted swiping. Those thousands of seconds would have become months of my life wasted doing nothing, just like it happens when we wait for a video to load or an old PC to boot. This application is a priceless shortcut.

title: Absolutely Great!
comment: Works great with the perfect amount of configurable options!  Nice job!

title: Contact search is poor
comment: It cannot find contacts by company name, notes or other than correct name.

title: Used to love this...but
comment: I used to seriously love this app but recently I have found that there are certain things it just will not find. I can go to my contacts and search for a name and it comes right up. If I put the same name in quickdroid it never comes up. What's the deal devs?
In the settings menu of Quickdroid just choose "Contacts" and then activate "Contact groups". Now all contacts should show up, not only those in the default group.

title: Best launcher
comment: Best launcher no need to organise icons just search and go.

title: Blooming magic
comment: EXACTLY what I have been looking for. Fast app searcher launcher. Type a letter or two & bang your there! Light weight, efficient. Great job Sir.

title: Hands down my most used apl
comment: After my home screen, this is the most used app I have. After having it I shudder to think how I could launch apps anyway else! 10 stars! Just wish there were more updates and more features, a la Linux Zeitgeist

title: Great app launcher
comment: Perfect for users of Alfred or Quicksilver. You just open Quickdroid and type in the app you'd like to open. I use this with Nova Launcher,and I've set up a double tap on the homescreen which opens Quickdroid. I haven't used my app drawer in months.

title: the curse of XT9
comment: Maybe iam doing something really wrong, but i have a problem that breaks the whole app, and that's XT9. It's on for me all the time. The inbuild google search function's text field ignores XT9, but the apps text field doesn't. So XT9 is predicting always the wrong thing, and that makes the whole application unuseable for me.
